docs.title: UoB GDS — Workshops
docs.text: Welcome! This site hosts slides, starter projects, and solutions for our workshops.

docs.title: How to use
docs.text:
• View online here or on GitHub.
  • Download starter packs from the Releases page: https://github.com/Zingawawoo/GDD-Repo/releases
  • No editing rights? That’s by design—open a Discussion: https://github.com/Zingawawoo/GDD-Repo/discussions

docs.title: Upcoming events
docs.text: See our Linktree for the latest schedule and links: https://linktr.ee/gddbris

docs.title: 📅 Events & Upcoming Workshops
docs.text: This calendar updates automatically when we add or change events.

docs.title: Tips for attendees
docs.text:
• Bring a laptop if you can.
  • Check the event details in case of upates.
